paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on BRCA2 variants and penetrance data from the study.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: An association was observed between p.Arg280His-rs25489 and breast cancer risk for BRCA2 mutation carriers.
This association was further tested in a second series of 4480 BRCA1 and 3016 BRCA2 mutation carriers.

functional_data.summary: The 280His allele decreases DNA repair capacity.

variants.additional_notes: The association was based on a small number of homozygous women diagnosed at a very early age.
key_quotes: An association was observed between p.Arg280His-rs25489 and breast cancer risk for BRCA2 mutation carriers.
The apparent increased risk was consistent with the fact that the 280His allele decreases DNA repair capacity.

extraction_metadata.notes: Extracted data focused solely on BRCA2 variants as per instructions.
